title: Where Will Apple Stock Be in 1 Year?

Learn More Fool.com contributor Parkev Tatevosian predicts where Apple (AAPL -1.06%) stock could be by the end of this year. *Stock prices used were the afternoon prices of Feb. 4, 2024. The video was published on Feb. 6, 2024. Parkev Tatevosian, CFA has positions in Apple. The Motley Fool has positions in and recommends Apple. The Motley Fool has a disclosure policy.
